name.baseName: Crushing ; Limestone ; Limestone ; Crushing ; All sizes; NESPS2
破碎 ; 石灰石 ; 石灰石 ; 破碎 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工艺产生的碎石灰石用于多种应用，例如在建筑业用于混凝土、道路基础和铁路道碴；在农业中用于土壤处理，以及在环保应用中用于烟气脱硫。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码10,三级代码101.0,四级代码1011文件，在完整版文件中第89页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.7，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是布袋除尘，其效率为99.7，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时)/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为石灰石，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
